head.title: Rotate {{FileFormatUp}} pages in {{EnvName}} apps
head.description: Use {{ProdFullName}} to rotate any {{FileFormatUp}} page. Manage PDF, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, images, archives, and other formats using our solutions.

header.title: Page rotation in {{FileFormatUp}}
header.description: {{ProdFullName}} is able to add new functionality to {{EnvNameShort}} apps. Process documents of popular business formats using various features, like pages rotation in {{FileFormatUp}} files.
header.subtitle: {{ProdFullName}}

about.title: About {{ProdShortName}}
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) is a mature document processing library that supports over 50 file formats, including PDF, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Visio, images, and archives. It offers features such as merging, splitting, extracting, moving, swapping, and removing pages to enhance your applications.

more_features.title: Powerful document content management
more_features.description: {{ProdFullName}} have a wide range of features, allowing you to process over 50 popular business file formats efficiently.

feature_1.title: Combine content of various file formats
feature_1.content: Combine PDFs, Word documents, presentations, spreadsheets, Visio files, images, and archives. Use operation specific options to obtain a decent result.

feature_2.title: Document pages management
feature_2.content: Rearrange document pages by moving, swapping, or deleting them to organize content effectively.

feature_3.title: Page layout control
feature_3.content: Rotate pages to provided angle or switch between landscape and portrait orientations.

feature_4.title: Extract pages into separate files
feature_4.content: Select one page or pages range and save as a brand new file in a new location.

formats.title: Rotate pages in many supported formats
formats.description: {{ProdShortName}} works with more than 50 file formats. Modify documents quickly using wide range of provided operations.

operations.title: Our solution features
operations.description: Be informed about features provided by our library.

examples.comment_2: Provide page number to be rotated
examples.comment_4: Save the result to desired location

content.title: [{{ProdShortName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) allows you to rotate {{FileFormatUp}} pages. Improve abilities of {{EnvName}} applications by encapsulation document management features.
content.step_2: Select number of page to be rotated.
content.step_4: Save the processed file to desired location.

code_1.title: How to turn over all even {{FileFormatUp}} pages
code_1.content: See the example turning over all even-numbered pages in a {{FileFormatUp}} document.
code_1.comment_1: Pass the source file to the constructor
code_1.comment_2: Get the number of document pages
code_1.comment_3: Set options to rotate even pages to 180 degrees
